name: Mini ship wars
description:
Captain! We have a new task, we urgently need to send our best crew!

Your battleship is equipped with the most modern weapons and upgrades. Infiltrate the lair
enemy, full of traps, labyrinths and warships. You are faced with a difficult task - to get
to the very end of the huge sea and defeat every enemy on your way, sailing 18
various locations-labyrinths, solving puzzles and engaging in dangerous battles.
